code: import{useState}from"react";import Navbar from"./Navbar";import LoginModal from"../login/LoginModal";import SearchSection from"./SearchSection";import FeaturesSection from"./FeaturesSection";import TransactionsTable from"./TransactionsTable";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function HomePage(){const[search,setSearch]=useState("");const[isLoginOpen,setIsLoginOpen]=useState(false);const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(false);const handleLogin=()=>{if(username&&password){setIsLoggedIn(true);setIsLoginOpen(false);}};const handleLogout=()=>{setIsLoggedIn(false);setUsername("");setPassword("");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-white text-red-900",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{isLoggedIn:isLoggedIn,handleLogout:handleLogout,handleLoginOpen:()=>setIsLoginOpen(true)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginModal,{isLoginOpen:isLoginOpen,setIsLoginOpen:setIsLoginOpen,username:username,setUsername:setUsername,password:password,setPassword:setPassword,handleLogin:handleLogin}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchSection,{search:search,setSearch:setSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FeaturesSection,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TransactionsTable,{})]});}
